p: The air-liquid interface of human nasal epithelial cells cultures collected from patients affected by chronic rhinosinusitis were recently exposed in vitro to a 0.5% solution of PVP-I (Nasodine® licensed by Firebrick Pharma) ( Ramezanpour et al., 2020). No cell toxicity was observed on paracellular permeability or cilia beat frequency. The trans epithelial electrical resistance of cultured cells was significantly reduced only after 30 minutes exposure to Nasodine® ( Meng et al., 2020). Consequently, PVP-I could be considered as a safe therapy when used as a mouthwash or taken nasally or used during ophthalmic surgeries.
